name: World Keepers: Last Resort
description: Destroy an ancient evil intent on wiping out humanity!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: 1.5 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 700 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: 3 GHz Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 700 MB available space
